website_summaries.verdict: A versatile case that will safeguard your MacBook Pro against scratches, scuffs and much more.
pros: Hard case is expertly crafted and delivers outstanding durability
Vent slots help reduce the risk that your MacBook Pro will overheat
Simple to install in just seconds
Equipped with anti-slip rubber feet to ensure your MacBook Pro will stay in place on any table or desk
cons: Fit may be too tight or too loose

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Good case. I went with the orange one and it looks great with all my stickers. I know some reviewers were saying that it didn't leave enough room near the usb-c ports but I did not experience that problem, it fits my 13" MacBook Pro w/ Touch Bar just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Fun colors, inexpensive, surprisingly sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I got the orange case, the color is bright and has lasted 10+ months since I purchased it. The rubber feet on the bottom have fallen off, but the case has gotten heavy use with daily travel to and from school/work so I was not surprised. For such an inexpensive case, I have been happily surprised and just recommended this brand to a family member for their new computer. I have had Speck cases in the past; I do not foresee this case lasting quite as long, but for the price ($14 compared to Speck's $50) I was happy to get a fun color and not worry if it doesn't last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Good shell for protection.
customer_reviews.text: As much as I love this shell I wish mine didn't crack as fast as it did when taking it off the laptop to clean. Not sure if I did it wrong or not but it did crack on one corner when attempting to take it off. Other then that I Love the color options and the feel of the shell on my macbook.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Not protective at all
customer_reviews.text: Top fit fine but bottom kept falling off when item was lifted
customer_reviews.author: Amzn Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: This has been on my MacBook since I bought it and I must say, I'm shocked at the durability for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Kory Delvaux

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Cheap plastic but holding up better than the Speck case I used with my old computer. Well vented.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Miller

customer_reviews.title: Looks greasy with the slightest fingerprint
customer_reviews.text: The colors are cool and it's well designed to fit the laptop model. What bothers me is the appearance after touching it just once. The finish is not oleophobic, so it shows fingerprints like crazy. The effect is that it constantly looks greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Nils

customer_reviews.title: MacBook Pro 13 inch Case
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and protects it well. I would order again
customer_reviews.author: D. Kells

customer_reviews.title: Highly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t even had this case for a week and the bottom will not stay on. Top piece is fine. This is a waste
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: Great case!
customer_reviews.text: It’s matte and see through and gets the job done!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the tangerine/orange colored cover. its cute but do not grab your laptop after moisturizing your hands. it will stain and leave fingerprint stains
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo flores

customer_reviews.title: Bottom casing doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: The bottom doesn’t fit in at all do not buy this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looked better in the photo
customer_reviews.text: The photos of the cover on Amazon dont accurately display the product. I thought it would have been brighter in color.
customer_reviews.author: Tready

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a pro case in grey with orange trim/zipper. so I order this cover in orange, and they look good together. This cover fits perfectly for my MacBook Pro, and prevents scratching.
customer_reviews.author: AgingShopper
